name: Gravibeat
description:
A game made for Mini Jam 107.

Unfinished but, almost what was envisioned at the start of the jam

The goal is to optimize your movement & attacks with the beat in order to survive as long as possible

Controls:

Z - Attack

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse - Gravity Field

It is rather difficult, I'll do some tweaking later on with the damages and such. 

Tips:

Defeating an Enemy drops and orb which restores half of the HP of the enemy killed, and one gravity field use.

Enemies spawn faster as time goes on, and also get tankier.

Gravity Field works as a stun, affects you too though!

The yellow bar  on the top of your UI  is your time for input bar, it is the time until the next beat, when is when your action will be performed.
